author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Christopher Ruocchio’s Kingdoms of Death, book four of The Sun Eater flips the series on its head. What if Hadrian is wrong about being able to negotiate with the Cielcin? What if his new found powers were used against him? What if there’s another chose one? Startlingly bleak, full of torture, and gorgeous prose interlining […]

The post REVIEW: Kingdoms of Death by Christopher Ruocchio appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Kingdoms of Death by Christopher Ruocchio
